name: Executive Suite
description: Luxurious suite with modern amenities, including a private balcony and jacuzzi.

name: Zen Escape
description: Tranquil room with calming ambiance, featuring a meditation space and a serene garden view.

name: Ocean View
description: Spacious room with a stunning view of the ocean, private terrace, and modern furnishings.

name: City Loft
description: Stylish loft in the heart of the city, with floor-to-ceiling windows and contemporary decor.

name: Garden Retreat
description: Cozy room with direct access to a lush garden and a charming outdoor seating area.

name: Penthouse Suite
description: Exclusive penthouse with panoramic city views, luxury amenities, and a private rooftop.

name: Mountain Lodge
description: Rustic lodge with breathtaking mountain views, a fireplace, and a cozy atmosphere.

name: Urban Studio
description: Compact studio in a bustling neighborhood, ideal for short stays with modern conveniences.
